name: GoogleMonkeyR adjustments
description:
Written for Google search using GoogleMonkeyR http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/9310
With simple up-to-date (10/2013) styling rules to reduce unused vertical space at the top, both for search pages and image search pages.
Since GoogleMonkeyR script update to 1.7 (4/11/2013), adjustments aren't necessary, though the reduced vertical space is still usefull.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.
